subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Navy promoted the assistant Ken Niumatalolo to replace Paul Johnson, who left Friday to take over at Georgia Tech. Niumatalolo, 42, is believed to be the N.C.A.A.’s first Polynesian head coach.
snippet: Navy promoted the assistant Ken Niumatalolo to replace Paul Johnson, who left Friday to take over at Georgia Tech. Niumatalolo, 42, is believed to be the N.C.A.A.’s first Polynesian head coach.
